content: this is a free crochet pattern for a mini crochet boob the file is written both in english and portuguese just scroll down the document to find the wanted language this is a begginer level amigurumi and the instructions are pretty simple but if you have any questions please just message me and i will be happy to help please credit me when you share pictures of your final product enjoy materials needed - crochet hook 2mm suggested - yarn 492 tex suggested in two colours one for the nipple and another for the skin - scissors - keychain final size 4 5mm diameter using 492tex yarn
